meanings.definition: The act of paying a fee.
meanings.sent1: The feeing for the concert tickets was reasonable.
meanings.sent2: I had to do the feeing before entering the museum.
meanings.sent3: The feeing for parking was so high, it felt like a robbery!
meanings.sent4: The feeing for the online course was a small price to pay for valuable knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The feeing for the gym membership made me think twice about signing up.

meanings.definition: The amount of money charged for a service.
meanings.sent1: The feeing for the haircut was quite expensive.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't afford the feeing for the car repair.
meanings.sent3: The feeing for the ice cream was surprisingly affordable.
meanings.sent4: The feeing for the hotel room was like a punch to the wallet.
meanings.sent5: The feeing for the plumbing service seemed fair for the quality of work.

meanings.definition: To give a fee for services rendered.
meanings.sent1: I will be feeing the mechanic for fixing my car.
meanings.sent2: She is feeing the lawyer for handling her case.
meanings.sent3: He was feeing the waiter generously for the excellent service.
meanings.sent4: The company will be feeing the consultant for their expert advice.
meanings.sent5: They were feeing the tour guide for showing them around the city.
